articles.title: QPRC Short Course 2021
articles.description: Website for the QPRC Short Course on the Tidyverse
articles.contents:
Contents
RStudio Workspace
Learning Objectives
Part 1
Part 2
Part 3
Intro Slides
RMarkdown Slides


RStudio Workspace
Please message Eric Leung if you do not have access to the project.
Learning Objectives
Part 1
Import spreadsheet-style data into R as a data.frame.
Visualize numeric vectors in this dataset using ggplot2
Visualize categorical/numeric variables as boxplots
Customize your plot using theme()
Change colors and breaks using {scales}
Part 2
List 5 key {dplyr} verbs for data manipulation
Sort a dataset by columns using arrange()
Select columns from a dataset using select()
Learn and apply mutate() to change the data type of a variable
Apply mutate() to calculate a new variable based on other variables in a data.frame.
Apply case_when in a mutate() statement to make a continuous variable categorical
Apply group_by()/summarize() as a pattern to get summary statistics, including counts, means, and standard deviations within a category.
Standardize variable names using clean_names()
Part 3
Articulate the different kinds of output formats in RMarkdown
Utilize YAML front matter to customize an RMarkdown report
Utilize parameters to make reusable reports
Use streams as data sources for an RMarkdown report
Intro Slides
Open the introduction slides in a separate window: https://laderast.github.io/qprc_short_course_2021/slides/#1


knitr::include_url("https://laderast.github.io/qprc_short_course_2021/slides/#1")





RMarkdown Slides
Open the Rmarkdown slides in a separate window: https://laderast.github.io/qprc_short_course_2021/slides/rmarkdown.html#1
